nodes.text: The Sounder Flats computer complex was an Imperial computer facility on Ruul, a planet in the Core Worlds. It was situated on Sounder Flats, between a steep hill and a deep canyon. Two Imperial bases nearby and a network of turrets protected it. However, they did not prove enough when Brenn Tantor conducted an information raid, capturing the facility long enough for Beri Tulon to extract passcodes to approach the AT-AT factory on Trasse.
